title: Dear Bella
description: Bella Mia Jensen Book lover, taco enthusiast, foodie, ladylike badass, rebel  When Bella turns up in Bendover, she quickly earns the respect of the Justice ladies for how swiftly she brings their pack of alpha men to their knees.  And she’s only six years old!  After a heartbreaking start in life, the youngest person to join Family Justice shows everyone what she’s made of pretty darn quick. Reunited with her fractured family, she comes into her own under the bright sunny skies of Arizona and gives us a glimpse into the future of Junior Justice.  For all Bella has overcome in her short life, there’s one thing she can’t get over. One person she just cannot forgive.  Santa. Some magic guy he turned out to be when he couldn’t even keep track of one kid.  Step into the heartwarming world of Family Justice at Christmastime as Brody and Heather fight for Bella’s future.  Expect laughs and eye rolls when Project Red Suit unfolds Plus plenty of sexy times and new insights into the Family Justice characters you’ve come to love.  Dear Bella Believe
author: Suzanne Halliday
